Tucson couldn't wait to see Nightlight once more.  Things were starting to =
come into mind.  Pleasureable thoughts that he never dreamed he'd have.  He=
 kept his attentions on Perceptor and took every word heartfully.

" Thank =
you for being honest with me Perceptor.  Now, I hate to ask favors of anyon=
e, but, do you suppose you may be able to get a hold of the configurations =
that were used on Rodimus?  If you can't I can understand. It's a difficult=
 task and I would never ask this otherwise."

Meanwhile, Quickstride arrive=
s at the Ark with Straight Shot on his back, as he bolts into the Ark via t=
he entrance, with the little femme still holding on confidently.

"Sorry I'=
m late Kup, it took me a while ta find a ride."
